channel.title: ::Help Command ( Delta ) [REP+++]

item.title: ::Help Command ( Delta ) [REP+++]
item.dc:creator: @noty noty
item.description:
@noty wrote:

Hey, Guys I’ve Searched Everywhere But I Don’t Find A ::Help Command Other Than That I Made By Myself, But I Have No Idea’s On How To Do As, Only Moderators, Administrators And Owners Can See It. My Is Currently Yelling Out ("["+playerName+"] Needs Help, Would A Staff Member Please Tele To Him?
Command I’m Currently Using:

} if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("modhelp")) { triggerTele(2476, 4956, 0); yell("["+playerName+"] Needs Help, Would A Staff Member Please Tele To Him?");

Read full topic
